snippet: The Los Angeles police say a 60-year-old man has been booked for investigation of murder in the shootings of his wife, who had dementia, and his sister, who was in a vegetative state.
abstract: Los Angeles police book Lance H Anderson for investigation of murder in shootings of his wife, who had dementia, and his sister, who was in a vegetative state.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles police say a 60-year-old man has been booked for investigation of murder in the shootings of his wife, who had dementia, and his sister, who was in a vegetative state.

headline.main: California: Man Surrenders in Deaths of Ill Relatives
headline.print_headline: California: Man Surrenders In Deaths of Ill Relatives
